text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _CaseTransmissionMode

name: CaseTransmissionMode
title: CaseTransmissionMode
description: Code for the mechanism by which disease was acquired by the living subject involved in the public health case. Includes sexually transmitted, airborne, bloodborne, vectorborne, foodborne, zoonotic, nosocomial, mechanical, dermal, congenital, environmental exposure, indeterminate.
